metadata.name: Hearts
metadata.description:
#01 Platinum Heart
The NFT holder will be sent a unique A2 poster featuring the #01 Platinum Heart.
Nappa leather heart framed in platinum inlaid with alexandrites and pearls.

Materials: 
Nappa leather heart framed in platinum inlaid with alexandrites and pearls. 



2048 x 2048 px


The NFT holder will be sent a unique A2 poster featuring the #01 Platinum Heart. 
the poster will be sent within three days (free worldwide shipping)
To clarify information on obtaining a poster, the owner must contact us on Twitter @myshev_inc

love lives in heaven
